post:
<b>Fusioned - Enterprise Hosting | KVM PureSSD and CachedSSD VPS | R1Soft Backup Services</b>

<b>»»»»»»»»»» Who we are »»»»»»»»»»
<a href="http://www.fusioned.net/" target="_blank">Fusioned</a></b> is a hosting solutions provider specializing in enterprise web hosting, <b>KVM VPS</b> and R1Soft backup solutions. Build from the ground up, with quality services in mind, Fusioned has been able to provide exceptional uptime, fast support, and blazing fast performance to it's customers.

Our new Supermicro <b>enterprise grade servers</b> are packed with Intel Xeon E3-1230v2 or Dual E5-2520 CPUs, loads of ECC RAM and <b>LSI powered RAID10 arrays</b> for both the storage as well as the caching layers (CachedSSD plans). With these configurations we are able to provide <b>maximum I/O performance</b> while maintaining data integrity and redundancy.

We host our servers at the Dataplace datacenter in Alblasserdam (Netherlands), and network connectivity is provider by <a href="http://www.proserve.nl/en/home" target="_blank">Proserve</a> and <a href="http://www.jointtransit.nl/" target="_blank">Jointtransit</a>.

Check out <a href="http://nl.fusioned.net/" target="_blank">http://nl.fusioned.net</a> for Test IP & Files.
